entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
